name: Witches For Hire!
description:
WITCHES FOR HIRE Hexes, Exorcisms and Shielding

A Mission Based FPS Co-op Shooter where witches, wizards and mages team up to defeat demon swarms while try to solve the most various and diverse missions and villager needs.

If your crops aren't properly growing, your dogs are barking for nothing at night or the people are experiencing collective nightmares, you may be in dire need for our talents. We have more than ten years of experience uplifting hexes, exorcizing ghosts and shielding your lands from supernatural harms.

We, sisters from the Moon Covenant, offer your village a wide array of  services in exchange of resources. Commonly we accept payments in ingredients for our next jobs, and ask for 50% of upfront payment.

If you may, you can contact us at midnight. Leave a candle in the middle of a crossroad surrounded by poisonberries and chant for us, and one of your sisters will show up in order to discuss details.

(We also look for astray animals and tend sick children as part of your job.)

 

Team up with your friends to take the most diverse missions for your coven. Solve villagers problems, kill hordes of monsters  and collaborate with each other to achieve greatness. 

With the class system, you choose your playstyle and learn to create smart solutions with your team!

Choose one of the available classes to play your way! There will be up to 4 classes to be selected (and more coming). Help you teammates using your unique class-based skills and enjoy the team solving problems and puzzles!

With classes, you will have an arsenal by you side to destroy those enemies!

We've started this game with one mission: give you the best magic co-op shooter experience. These are our goals and objectives:

  • Apply the Class System;
  • Apply the Potion Crafting mechanics;
  • Open our Steam Page!
  • Add more sttafs and weapons;
  • Improve visuals and create more characters;
  • More missions!
  • More enemies!
  • Better HUB interactions;
  • Solve bugs;
  • Want more? We have more! Keep tracking us on social media!

Controls: 

  • WASD: Movement (Walk)
  • Shift: Run
  • Space: Jump 
  • Mouse: Aim 
  • Left Mouse: Shoot (hold) 
  • Tab: Select missions
  • 1, 2 and Mouse Scroll: Swap weapons

Known Issues:

  • Unresponsive UI;
  • Bit of laggy;
  • Only 2 weapons available;
  • Sometimes, enemies spawns inside the player;
